name: IMP_RSN_NO_STERILE_RESULT
description: This table stores the reason why a sterilization result was not obtained before use.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REASON_NO_RESULT_OBTAINED
columns.description: This column stores the reason why a sterilization result was not obtained before use.
